MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the EH43 postcode area of Walkerburn, affecting properties in Park Avenue and surrounding streets. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we carried out investigations at the Walkerburn primary substation and our engineers have not identified the root cause of the fault, we now expect your supply to be restored by 8pm. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6.51pm on Saturday 24th April 2021.
